sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { User, Lock, Settings, LogOut, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; const Profile = ({ user, theme, onLogout }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const isDark = theme === 'dark'; const styles = { // 1. PAGE CONTAINER (Web Layout) container: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#0f172a' : '#f8fafc', minHeight: '100%', fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif", padding: '40px', maxWidth: '1200px', // Limits width on huge screens margin: '0 auto' }, // Header Area header: { marginBottom: '30px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '15px' }, // Back Button Style backBtn: { cursor: 'pointer', padding: '10px', background: isDark ? '#334155' : '#fff', borderRadius: '12px', border: isDark ? '1px solid #475569' : '1px solid #e2e8f0', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }, title: { fontSize: '28px', fontWeight: '800', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b', lineHeight: '1.2' }, subtitle: { color: '#64748b', fontSize: '15px' }, // 2. GRID LAYOUT (The Web Structure) grid: { display: 'grid', // Desktop: 350px Left Sidebar, rest Right Content. Mobile: 1 column. gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(320px, 1fr))', gap: '30px', alignItems: 'start' }, // --- LEFT COLUMN: IDENTITY CARD --- identityCard: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderRadius: '24px', padding: '40px 30px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', boxShadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.03)', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0' }, avatarWrapper: { width: '120px', height: '120px', borderRadius: '50%', padding: '4px', background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4f46e5, #ec4899)', marginBottom: '20px' }, avatar: { width: '100%', height: '100%', borderRadius: '50%', objectFit: 'cover', border: '4px solid #fff', backgroundColor: '#f1f5f9' }, name: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: '800', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b', marginBottom: '5px' }, email: { color: '#64748b', marginBottom: '20px' }, badge: { backgroundColor: '#eff6ff', color: '#4f46e5', padding: '8px 20px', borderRadius: '20px', fontSize: '13px', fontWeight: '700', border: '1px solid #c7d2fe' }, // --- RIGHT COLUMN: DETAILS & ACTIONS --- rightColumn: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '24px' }, // Info Section (College Details) detailsBox: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderRadius: '20px', padding: '30px', boxShadow: '0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.02)', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0' }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: '18px', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '20px', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, detailRow: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', padding: '15px 0', borderBottom: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #f1f5f9' }, detailLabel: { color: '#94a3b8', fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: '600' }, detailValue: { color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b', fontWeight: '700', fontSize: '15px' }, // Action Grid (The Buttons) actionsGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(240px, 1fr))', // Creates cards gap: '20px' }, actionCard: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', padding: '20px', borderRadius: '16px', cursor: 'pointer', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0', transition: 'all 0.2s', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '15px' }, iconBox: (color, bg) => ({ width: '45px', height: '45px', borderRadius: '12px', backgroundColor: bg, color: color, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }) }; return (
{/* Header */}
navigate(-1)}>
My Profile
Manage your account and preferences
{/* LEFT: Identity Card */}
{user.name}
{user.email}
Student Account
{/* RIGHT: Content */}
{/* 1. Academic Details */}
Academic Information
Institution Name {user.college}
Registration ID {user.regNo}
{/* 2. Account Actions (Grid of Cards) */}
Account Settings
navigate('/edit-profile')}>
Edit Profile
Update personal info
navigate('/change-password')}>
Security
Change password
navigate('/settings')}>
Preferences
Theme & Language
Log Out
Sign out of account
); }; export default Profile;
